name: Arbiter

skills.name: Gaze of Justice
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 25% Weaken debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Enforced Humility
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 75% chance to decrease duration of all enemy buffs by 1 turn.

skills.name: Mentor of Heroes
skills.description: Fills Turn Meters of all allies by 30%, places 50% Increase ATK on all allies for 2 turns, heals all allies by 25% of their max HP if they have less than 50% HP.

skills.name: Destinyâ€™s Call
skills.description: Revives all dead allies to 35% HP, fills Turn Meters of all allies by 20%, grants Arbiter an extra turn if an ally was revived.

skills.name: Aura
skills.description: Increases Ally SPD in Arena by 30%

book_priority: A3, A4 (for cooldowns and team utility)

masteries.pve: Support + Offense (Warmaster for Clan Boss, Evil Eye, Lasting Gifts)
masteries.pvp: Support + Defense (Unshakeable, Rapid Response, Evil Eye)

notes: Arbiter is a top-tier speed lead and reviver for Arena, Dungeons, and Faction Wars.
A3 is a premier Turn Meter boost and team heal.
A4 revive with extra turn enables immediate follow-up.
A2 is strong for buff control in Arena and Hydra.
Needs high SPD and enough ACC for debuff/buff control.
